fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services

EU initiatives and policies in the fields of Food, Intellectual Property, Information Society, Financial Services, Product Safety, Chemicals and Emerging Technologies 
 
Negotiations of the Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership (TTIP) (currently on hold)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Multistakeholder expert group to support the application of Regulation (EU) 2016/679#E03537#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3537#Member#C#Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership Stakeholder Advisory Group #E02988#Benedicte Federspiel#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2988#Member#B#Civil society
goals__remit: The Transatlantic Consumer Dialogue (TACD) is a forum of US and EU consumer organisations which develops and agrees on joint consumer policy recommendations to the US government and European Union to promote the consumer interest in EU and US policy making.
